document_name: Overview of all the government will point in the message
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/NOR/2021/NOR-2021-08-01-Overview of all the government will point in the message_62093acd4d9fa618c9604eae0c6645fc.pdf
document_description: This document is the government's white paper laying out how it intends to meet its climate targets by 2030. It sets sectoral strategies of emissions reductions, notably with regard transportation and the carbon tax.This document notably replaces Meld St. 41.
